title: ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: When using ajc to compile Java source files and create a .jar file with the outjar option, the generated .jar file does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file. The ajc documentation suggests that the outjar option should create a zip file, but it is not clear how to include a valid MANIFEST.MF file in the output.
OB: When calling ajc with the sourceroots option and the outjar option to specify the output .jar file, the resulting .jar file is missing a MANIFEST.MF file.
EB: The ajc compiler should include a MANIFEST.MF file in the generated .jar file when using the outjar option.
SR: To reproduce the issue, execute the command 'ajc sourceroots <mydir outjar <my.jar' and observe that the generated .jar file does not contain a MANIFEST.MF file.
